## Dataset 1 (job_postings) cleaning
```{r}
job_postings_clean <- job_postings %>%
  filter(!is.na(posting_date), !is.na(job_title)) %>% 
mutate(date = mdy(posting_date), year = year(date), month = month(date)) ## The posting date is read as a character by R, so we need to convert it into a date object
view(job_postings_clean)
```
